name: Choco Milky Sideloading iOS Repo
description: A simple hosted library of iOS files (IPAs and more).

items.name: Nuvio
items.description: Movie and TV streaming, supports Stremio addons. Status: Working ✅

items.name: SpotC++
items.description: Eevee Spotify Reborn compiled into an IPA file. Status: Working ✅

items.name: Portal
items.description: IPA signer and repo importer. Status: Working ✅

items.name: P12Cracker (beta)
items.description: Cracks the password of .p12 files. Needs an API key. Status: Working ✅

items.name: HDFlix
items.description: Movie and TV show streaming app. Status: Working ✅

items.name: DebToIPA
items.description: Convert .deb files into IPA files. (Only works for debs made to be an IPA) Status: Working ✅

items.name: Cash App++ v5 Trial
items.description: Tweaked Cash App with fake money and payments. (Does not give real money) Status: Working ✅

items.name: adspeed
items.description: .dylib file for making in-app ads faster. Status: Working ✅
